name: Notes: Severe weather warnings
info:
This flow runs regularly via inject node 
auto triggering.

The first part of the flow here 
picks up severe weather info from the UK
Met Office using one of the regional
RSS feeds from the list below.

The flow will need to be modified if
the warning needs to come from a
different weather service or the Met Office 
changes the format of their warninbgs.

List of Met Office RSS feeds:

https://weather.metoffice.gov.uk/guides/rss

This flow sends a Tx message when a warning is
available, and it can also send an email - enable 
this link out if you wish. 

The second part of this flow gets thunderstorm and
high wind warnings from Open-Meteo.

Remember to set your latitude and longitude on the 
first tab so that the weather is picked up for the
right place. 

Disable the Async out node on the first tab while 
testing any changes made here. Re-enable it when you
are sure things are working as expected. 

Regional customisations may be available on the 
GitHub project page: 
https://github.com/linker3000/MeshBop
